snippet.title: Tonight we hunt Trailer
snippet.description:
A hunter seeks revenge against the demons he faced in his past.
Tonight we hunt is a game based in the boss battles, takes inspiration from classic Castlevania and Megaman games to create an unique game based in ecuadorian legends. Its going to be a short and wonderful experience telling a story about demons and revenge.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tonight_we_hunt_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TonightWeHuntGame
Game page: https://sebastian-maldonado.itch.io/tonight-we-hunt
